attributes.action: During Tier 4 and 3 Restrictions give everyone Free sky Sports and BT
attributes.additional_details:
We would like you to consider this and give it to current sky or Freeview or BT etc customers 

Because before lockdown stadiums were full and offered a day out to escape from everything and they also offered a sense of togetherness. With that still gone for Tier 3 and 4 populations Mental Health will decline. If you can keep Gyms open you can certainly use a little bit of Tax payer money to boost morale in this way
attributes.background:
The government should work with Oliver Dowden and the Premier League along with TV companies where for those in Tiers 3 and 4 get free sport 

Because fans can not go to the games and take their minds off the stresses of life. watching a game of football or an F1 race can offer an escape

rejection.details: The Government is not responsible for the provision of premium TV services. This is a matter for individual consumers and providers.
